document_data.name: Barimus Whitehand
document_data.refs2e: {{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|4}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 3: The Bron's Deputies}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Barimus Whitehand''' was a law enforcement officer in the town of [[Voonlar]] sometime during the term of Bron [[Buorstag Hlammythyl]], ''i.e.'', from about [[1355 DR]] until at least [[1372 DR]].
document_data.Personality: He did not pursue violence for violence's sake, but liked the peace and orderly calm that resulted from force applied appropriately.
document_data.Abilities: He was proficient with a [[greatsword]], but had no other significant abilities.
document_data.Possessions: He wore [[chain mail]]{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|3}}
document_data.History: Barimus joined in a fight on the Bron's side one night and was offered the position of deputy on the spot. At some point in his career he received some training from the [[Zhentilar]].
